Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 5 wickets
Maheesh Theekshana took 3 wickets for 25 runs
Asitha Fernando took 3 wickets for 35 runs
Wanindu Hasaranga took 4 wickets for 40 runs
Charith Asalanka scored 62 runs off 61 balls
Gudakesh Motie scored 50 runs off 61 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy
Sri Lanka elected to bowl first
